faq.title: Good to Know
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions.
started.title: üìò Getting Started
started.subtitle: Setup guidance, platform integration, and everything you need to begin with automated Bitcoin trading.

started.items.title: Which markets and timeframes are supported?
started.items.description: Our strategy is optimized for Bitcoin but can be applied to other volatile assets and timeframes above 4 hours.

started.items.title: How does the system handle market volatility?
started.items.description: The strategy adapts dynamically to changing market conditions, maintaining stability even during turbulent periods.

started.items.title: Are all trades profitable?
started.items.description: No. Losses are part of any trading strategy. The system focuses on managing downside risk while maintaining statistical edge over time.

started.items.title: Is the system suitable for beginners?
started.items.description: Yes. Fully automated operation and intuitive design make it easy to start ‚Äî no prior experience required.

started.items.title: How do I access the strategy?
started.items.description: After subscribing, you can run and manage the strategy directly through your account ‚Äî quick and straightforward.

started.items.title: Can I customize the strategy?
started.items.description: Yes. Key parameters such as risk profile and trading behavior can be adjusted to match your preferences.

started.items.title: Is my capital safe?
started.items.description: Yes. The system does not access your wallet or funds. You retain full control over your investments at all times.

started.items.title: How much does the system cost?
started.items.description: We offer subscription plans tailored to different needs ‚Äî transparent, fair, and performance-oriented.

started.items.title: Is there a trial version?
started.items.description: Yes. You can test the strategy free for 7 days to evaluate its performance. After the trial, you can choose a subscription that fits your trading style.

started.items.title: What kind of support is provided?
started.items.description: Our support team is available 24/7 via chat and email to assist you whenever needed.
